attributes.action: Leave the EU on WTO terms on time now and honour Brexit
attributes.additional_details: We knew what we were voting for as the Remainers kept telling us if we voted to leave that we wouldn't be in the Cutoms Union, and what we wouldn't be able to do. So to keep saying we didn't know what we voted for is not correct as they kept telling us.
attributes.background: We voted to leave the EU so please do what the majority wanted.
